message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your offer was a good start, but I think a 52.5 / 47.5 split is more reflective of the time pressure.
Meet me in the middle of our previous offers, 57.5-42.5 is a fair compromise.
This is getting ridiculous. Let's just split it evenly and avoid losing any more money to inflation.
